NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_16.name: "Need a Weapon?"
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_16.description: Try out a new weapon customization item.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_26.name: A Fellow of Infinite Jest
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_26.description: Kill three enemies with the ball in a matchmade Oddball game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_7.name: A True Test of Legends
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_7.description: Complete all main campaign missions on Legendary difficulty.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_10.name: Air Raid
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_10.description: In co-op, kill 100 enemies while all players are riding air vehicles.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_1.name: Augmented
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_1.description: Earn 3 stars in 5 Tier 3 Weapon Drills.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_8.name: Back to the Chopper
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_8.description: Earn "Splatter" with a Brute Chopper in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_21.name: Bare Your Fangs
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_21.description: Complete the main campaign on Normal difficulty.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_29.name: Big Brother
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_29.description: Fully upgrade the Threat Sensor ability.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_19.name: Bomb Returned
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_19.description: Repel an enemy grenade with the Repulsor in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_3.name: Bring Shiela Home Safely
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_3.description: Get the Scorpion all the way to the "House" without it blowing up.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_10.name: Brothers Grim
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_10.description: Take down the Spartan Killers Hyperius and Tovarus.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_13.name: Brutality
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_13.description: Kill an enemy with melee using a bladed weapon in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_31.name: Conservation of Momentum
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_31.description: Complete the Conservatory in less than 15 minutes.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_30.name: Control Freak
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_30.description: Assist in capturing all zones that lead to a score in a matchmade Total Control game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_18.name: Controlled Demolition
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_18.description: In co-op, destroy four Fuel Silos within five seconds at either Ransom Keep or the Forge of Teash.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_11.name: Cow Catcher
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_11.description: In co-op, splatter 50 enemies while riding in a vehicle with another player.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_0.name: Deadeye
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_0.description: Earn 3 stars in a Weapon Drill.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_7.name: Dispatches From the Front
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_7.description: Access your first UNSC Audio Log.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_20.name: Do You Even Gift?
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_20.description: Drop a Power Weapon for an ally in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_24.name: Enemies Everywhere!
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_24.description: Mark 3+ enemies at once in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_5.name: Fallen
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_5.description: Follow the UNSC signal to a Banished stronghold called the Tower. Find the source. Get out alive.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_22.name: Fight Hard, Die Well
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_22.description: Complete all main campaign missions on Heroic difficulty.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_8.name: First Responders
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_8.description: In co-op, answer all UNSC distress calls on any difficulty.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_26.name: Forza Veloce
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_26.description: Complete all 14 main missions in under eight hours.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_5.name: Gatecrasher
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_5.description: Breach the Auditorium in under three minutes.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_29.name: Getting Strong Now
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_29.description: Launch into Training Mode for the first time.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_5.name: Greased Lightning
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_5.description: Complete the Movement Yard in under 25 seconds.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_12.name: Gruesome Twosome
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_12.description: In co-op, kill 50 enemies while riding a Mongoose with another player.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_25.name: Gun Runner
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_25.description: Take down all three Banished AA guns.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_23.name: Headmaster
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_23.description: Complete all main missions on Legendary with all Skulls active.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_13.name: Hear These Words!
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_13.description: Infiltrate the Command Spire and put an end to the Reformation.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_13.name: Hidden Experience
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_13.description: Locate and secure a Spartan Core.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_20.name: Humble Beginnings
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_20.description: Complete one level in a Battle Pass.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_7.name: Hunter. Killer.
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_7.description: Defeat the Hunter pair stationed at the base of the Spire.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_9.name: Hunting Party
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_9.description: In co-op, eliminate all Banished High-Value Targets on any difficulty.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_19.name: I'm Ready, How 'Bout You?
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_19.description: Change your Spartan's look in the Customize menu.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_28.name: Impervious
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_28.description: Fully upgrade the Drop Wall ability.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_11.name: Infinity Down
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_11.description: Access your first Spartan Audio Log.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_16.name: Inseparable
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_16.description: In co-op, kill a Hunter and its bond brother within three seconds of each other.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_0.name: It Really Does Beat Everything
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_0.description: Eliminate all enemies at the South Beacon with a Scorpion Tank.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_15.name: Kebab
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_15.description: Destroy an enemy vehicle with the Skewer in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_13.name: Keep It Steady
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_13.description: Kill 5 enemies with a Sniper Rifle from a vehicle. All players aboard vehicle share progress.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_16.name: Legends
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_16.description: At the end he was just a soldier. Hoping he'd done the right thing.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_11.name: Light the Way
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_11.description: Reach the Beacons, assemble the Sequence, and gain access to the Command Spire.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_4.name: Make a Little More Noise
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_4.description: Grab a power weapon from the Tutorial armory.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_29.name: MEDIC!
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_29.description: Revive 3 allies in an Attrition/Elimination round in a matchmade or custom game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_26.name: Mix Things Up
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_26.description: Get at least one kill with every available weapon and grenade on the Banished ship.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_17.name: Money in the Bank
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_17.description: Access your first Mjolnir Armor Locker.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_4.name: More Than He Bargained For
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_4.description: Defeat War Chief Escharum without ever fully losing your shields.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_21.name: Multi-class Racer
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_21.description: Drive 4 unique vehicles in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_25.name: Natural Formation Location Sensation
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_25.description: Gain access to a loot cave in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_9.name: New Kid on the Block
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_9.description: Earn "Perfect" with a VK78 Commando in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_28.name: Nosebleed
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_28.description: Check out the best possible view.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_23.name: One Shot, Top Mid
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_23.description: Mark an enemy located at "Top Mid" in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_29.name: Out with a Bang
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_29.description: Kill the Tower commander with a Plasma grenade.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_10.name: Party Bus
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_10.description: Earn "Mount Up" in a Razorback in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_27.name: Passing the Gas
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_27.description: Kill a Grunt that's been thrown by a Brute.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_15.name: Passion for Fashion
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_15.description: Wear a new armor customization item.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_6.name: Peak Performance
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_6.description: Earn 2,000 score in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_12.name: Peeker's Disadvantage
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_12.description: "Back Smack" an enemy who is zoomed in with a scoped weapon in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_8.name: Pelican Down
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_8.description: Shut down the first Spire and stop Zeta's Reformation before it's too late.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_23.name: Please Shut Up
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_23.description: Take out a Banished Propaganda Tower.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_28.name: Rapid Unscheduled Disassembly
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_28.description: Destroy both Phantoms before they leave Outpost Tremonius.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_0.name: Reclaimer
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_0.description: Capture your first Forward Operating Base.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_1.name: Resurgency
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_1.description: Capture all available Forward Operating Bases.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_14.name: Rolling Thunder
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_14.description: Kill 5 enemies with a Gravity Hammer from a vehicle. All players aboard vehicle share progress.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_27.name: Running Laps
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_27.description: Capture the flag twice in a matchmade Capture the Flag game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_18.name: Secret Stash
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_18.description: Place an item in the Razorback's storage in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_20.name: Set a Fire in Your Heart

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_14.name: Sick Burn
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_14.description: Kill an enemy with the Ravager's charged shot in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_16.name: Skyhook Shot
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_16.description: "Grapplejack" an enemy flying vehicle in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_7.name: Slaying with Style
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_7.description: Earn a Mythic Medal in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_2.name: Spire Stalker
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_2.description: Kill 40 enemies with the Stalker Rifle at the Command Spire.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_31.name: Straight to the Bank
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_31.description: Deposit 5 Power Seeds in a matchmade Stockpile game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_4.name: Takes One to Make One
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_4.description: Splatter an enemy with a Ghost.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_17.name: That Thing on the Left is the Brake
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_17.description: Test drive a new vehicle customization.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_22.name: They See Me Rollin'
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_22.description: Spectate an ally that is driving a Warthog or Razorback in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_14.name: Together. Again.
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_14.description: A friend is in danger and time is running out. It's time to face your past and save your future.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_2.name: Together. Again?
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_2.description: Explore the underbelly of Zeta Halo and retrieve a weapon to turn the tide of this conflict.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_17.name: Too Many Goodbyes
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_17.description: Defeat the Harbinger. Confront the truth.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_3.name: Turnabout is Fair Play
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_3.description: Kill one Chieftain and use his turret to kill another in the Repository.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_9.name: Two Sides to Every Story
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_2_9.description: Access your first Banished Audio Log.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_6.name: Unearthed
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_6.description: Shut down the Banished mining laser and gain access to the Conservatory.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_1.name: Vintage Fisticuffs
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_1.description: In the Nexus, kill the Hunter pair with melee final blows.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_7.name: Wardens of Zeta
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_7.description: In co-op, complete all seven Banished outposts on any difficulty.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_5.name: Wars with Friends
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_5.description: Bring some rescued UNSC Marines along for the ride into a main mission.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_11.name: Watt Say You?
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_11.description: Earn "Chain Reaction" with a Shock Rifle in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_23.name: We Have a Job For You

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_12.name: What Will It Take?
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_12.description: Enter the Nexus and learn the secrets of the Spires. Trust is a fragile thing, isn't it?

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_6.name: What's Rightfully Ours
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_6.description: In co-op, capture all Forward Operating Bases on any difficulty.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_14.name: Which One of Us is the Machine?
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_14.description: Get and equip a new AI.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_1.name: Whip-Riding the Ghost
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_3_1.description: Use the Grappleshot to board an enemy Ghost.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_19.name: Wolves at the Doors
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_19.description: In co-op, lower all three gates within 15 seconds of each other at Riven Gate.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_17.name: Working Remote
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_17.description: Pick up a weapon using the Grappleshot in a matchmade game.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_30.name: Workplace Safety Violation
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_5_30.description: Kill an enemy with the Banished mining laser.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_17.name: You, Me, Same Page
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_6_17.description: In co-op, destroy all cooling towers at the Dig Site within 60 seconds of each other.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_4.name: Zeta
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_4.description: Fight your way through Outpost Tremonius and step out onto the surface of Zeta Halo.

NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_28.name: Zone Ranger
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_4_28.description: Secure 5 zones in a matchmade Strongholds game.
